tasks.label: Serve Jekyll Site
tasks.command: source /usr/local/share/chruby/chruby.sh && chruby $(cat .ruby-version) && bundle exec jekyll serve --host 0.0.0.0

tasks.label: Build Jekyll Site
tasks.command: source /usr/local/share/chruby/chruby.sh && chruby $(cat .ruby-version) && bundle exec jekyll build
